Name: windows11_uupdump
Overview:
A container to download the Window 11 insiders build and put it in the iso share to install as a vm
Container uses files from https://uupdump.net/ to easily download UUP files from  the Windows Update servers.

The default setting in the container will download Windows 11.
However you can add a script file from https://uupdump.net/  for downloading other isos.
To do this download and unzip the download package and add the files to the custom folder in appdata
set the variable to custom.

Set the name for the downloaded iso image in the isoname variable


This project is not affiliated with Microsoft Corporation. Windows is a registered trademark of Microsoft Corporation.

Default or Custom.Name: Default or Custom
Default or Custom.Description: Choose the default script or choose custom to add your own from uupdump.net (add name in name variable if you choose custom)

Name for ISO image.Name: Name for ISO image
Name for ISO image.Description: name for downloaded iso to be put in the iso share

Custom script name.Name: Custom script name
Custom script name.Description: If using custom script in appdata/custom from uupdump.net you can specify the name here (you shouldnt need to change this)

Isos path.Name: Isos path
Isos path.Description: Path to where you store your iso images
